Classes.title: Course materials
Classes.Title_IntroNaval: Introduction to Naval Architecture and Ocean Engineering
Classes.Explain_IntroNaval: This course is designed to provide an overview of the naval architecture and ocean engineering. The course will cover the basic concepts of naval architecture and ocean engineering.
Classes.Explain_Dynamics: This course is designed to provide an overview of the dynamics. The course will cover the basic concepts of dynamics, including the kinematics of particles, kinematics of rigid bodies, kinetics of particles, and kinetics of rigid bodies.
Classes.Explain_VibrationEngineering: This course is designed to provide an overview of the vibration engineering. The course will cover the basic concepts of vibration engineering, including the single degree of freedom systems, multi degree of freedom systems, continuous systems, and nonlinear systems.
Classes.Explain_RoboticsSimulation: This course is designed to provide an overview of the robotics simulation. The course will cover the basic concepts of robotics simulation, including the kinematics, dynamics, and control of underwater robotics and its simulation in Python.
